personalInfoData.name: Md Imam Hossain
personalInfoData.message: Driven by a passion for the latest tech trends, I specialize in crafting mobile applications that are both user-centric and technically robustâ€”from concept to deployment.

aboutData.details: Experienced Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in building high-performance, scalable mobile applications. Specializing in Android development, cross-platform solutions, and iOS development, I have successfully delivered apps across industries like e-commerce, food delivery, telecom, and ERP. Skilled in modern app architectures, optimizing performance, and leading end-to-end feature development, I collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive best practices and seamless user experiences. Passionate about crafting efficient, scalable mobile solutions that align with business goals and user needs.

responsibilities: Led requirements analysis and project planning for clients.
Engineered high-performance TelCo apps for heavy traffic.
Redesigned app architecture for 30M+ monthly active users
Streamlined telecom purchase/payment modules, boosting revenue.
Added live GPS tracking and printer SDKs to delivery apps.
Mentored interns and juniors, sharing technical expertise.
Skilled in Android (Kotlin), Flutter, and iOS (Swift).
Collaborated across teams for timely, quality releases.
Integrated third-party services and analytics tools.

projectsData.name: Offer, Recharge, Sports
projectsData.descriptionData: All-in-one self-service telecommunications app with 50 million downloads on Play Store.
projectsData.responsibilityData: As an Android Engineer, focused on developing features, conducting code reviews, and engaging in solution-oriented discussions. Played a key role in the R&D team, exploring and implementing best practices and innovative ideas to enhance the user experience.
projectsData.technologyData: Android SDK, Multi-Module, MVVM Architecture, Kotlin, Java, Dagger Hilt, Coroutines, Jetpack Compose, Retrofit, Socket.IO, Room, Play Feature Delivery, JUnit, Mockito, Jenkins, Fastlane, etc.

projectsData.name: Longshot
projectsData.descriptionData: Longshot app connects to Longshot cameras, providing live target viewing and tracking tools for precise shooting analysis.
projectsData.responsibilityData: Implemented core features, including support for new camera models and camera detection through IP-based ping. Added a grid overlay option on the video feed to enhance precision in target tracking and analysis.
projectsData.technologyData: Flutter, Bloc Architecture, Fijkplayer, Video Player, Screen Recording, Geolocator, Camera, etc.

projectsData.name: Offers, Usage & More!
projectsData.descriptionData: A one-stop self-service app for telecommunications with 10 million downloads on Play Store.
projectsData.responsibilityData: Part of the software engineering team that was responsible for redesigning the My Robi app with a new UI and architecture to accommodate a large user base.
projectsData.technologyData: Android SDK, MVVM Architecture, Kotlin, Coroutines, Retrofit, WorkManager, Room, Datastore, Google Maps SDK, Material Design etc.

projectsData.name: HungryNaki - Food Delivery
projectsData.descriptionData: HungryNaki is an online food ordering and delivery service launched in 2013 to deliver to doorsteps.
projectsData.responsibilityData: Improved app performance with caching and API load optimization. Developed modules for Customers, Riders, and Partners. Implemented live GPS order tracking and integrated a printer SDK for handheld POS devices.
projectsData.technologyData: Android SDK, Kotlin, MVVM Architecture, Dagger 2, RxJava 3, Coroutines, Apollo Android GraphQL, Android Jetpack Components, Data Binding, Navigation Component, Google Maps SDK, Aliyun OSS SDK, Android Service, etc.

publicationsData.title: Heart disease prediction using distinct artificial intelligence techniques: performance analysis and comparison
publicationsData.subtitle: Iran Journal of Computer Science - Springer Nature Link Â· Jun 12, 2023
publicationsData.description: This research improves heart disease prediction by identifying key risk factors like age, gender, and lifestyle through feature selection. A performance analysis and comparison of algorithms, including Logistic Regression, NaÃ¯ve Bayes, K-NN, SVM, Decision Tree, and Random Forest (using selected features), reveal that Random Forest achieves 90% accuracy for early-stage prediction, offering a reliable tool for forecasting heart disease.

publicationsData.title: Understanding Kotlin Delegates with Practical Examples
publicationsData.subtitle: ProAndroidDev - MediumÂ· Jan 26, 2025
publicationsData.description: This article explains Kotlin delegates, which simplify code by delegating tasks to other objects. It covers property and class delegation, built-in delegates like lazy, observable, and vetoable, and custom delegates for tasks like logging, JSON parsing, and shared preferences.

certificationsData.title: Bachelor of Science in Information and Communication Engineering
certificationsData.subtitle: Noakhali Science and Technology University, Bangladesh
